title: Applying for a Residence permit in Montenegro | AA Konsalting
description: Applying for a Residence permit in Montenegro
page-header-text: Endless mountains, crystal clear waters of the Adriatic Sea, gentle sun, magical nature, ancient cities saturated with the spirit of history, rivers of wine and divine dishes - all about this is Montenegro.
page-header-text-2: We provide a wide range of services, to be Montenegro your home!

benefits.maintitle: Montenegro residence permit provide a lot of advantages, for example:
benefits.benefit-1: Possibility to stay permanently in the country - without going abroad
benefits.benefit-2: Opportunity not to pay touristâ€™ tax
benefits.benefit-3: Opportunity to open a bank account in Montenegro and buy a car
benefits.benefit-4: Simplified visa application: USA, Schengen, Great Britain
benefits.benefit-6: Opportunity get a permanent residence after 5 years, and then a Montenegrin passport after 10 years

footer.paragraph: Everyone wants live on top of a mountain, but full happiness and development going on while you are climbing there.
footer.title: Contact us to get the keys for a new life

service-1.subtitle: Registration of a
service-1.panel-p: Preparation of documents and obtaining / extending of residence permit through all possible options in Montenegro, including:
panel-ul: Providing a postal address for an individual;
Providing a postal address for a legal entity and an address for a company;
Administrative and legal supports of obtaining a residence permit process;

service-2.subtitle: A turn-key
panel-ul: Full complex of registration services arrangement;

service-3.subtitle: from/to Montenegrin, Serbian
panel-ul: Providing of documents flow translation in Montenegro;

service-4.subtitle: Private and corporate
panel-ul: Issues of purchasing real estate for investment purposes;
Health Care and Education issues for children;
Transport and rental of residential/office premises issues.

service-5.subtitle: Comprehensive
panel-ul: Assistance with searching and selection of ready-made real estate and land plots;
Assistance with searching and selection of a responsible contractor for installation and construction, commissioning works.
